elements.title: News(Top News : The U.S. detects additional attempts by Russia to acquire munitions from North Korea following a delivery of infantry rockets and missiles last year.) - 2023.03.31 PM5
News(Top News : President Yoon Suk Yeol swiftly announces his new national security adviser following Kim Sung-han's abrupt resignation.) - 2023.03.30 PM5
News(Top News : The government will spend 60 billion won to offer lodging and travel discounts to spur moribund consumption.) - 2023.03.29 PM5
News(Top News : North Korean leader Kim Jong-un calls for flawless preparations to use nuclear weapons at any time anywhere.) - 2023.03.28 PM5
News(Top News : North Korea conducts its eighth ballistic missile launch this year as a U.S. nuclear-powered aircraft carrier is set to arrive in Busan.) - 2023.03.27 PM5
News(Top News : President Yoon Suk Yeol pledges to make North Korea pay for its provocations as he commemorates West Sea Defense Day.) - 2023.03.24 PM5
News(Top News : The key interest rate gap between South Korea and the U.S. widens to the largest in 22 years following the Fed's 25-basis-point hike.) - 2023.03.23 PM5
News(Top News : Democratic Party chief Lee Jae-myung is indicted on five counts, including breach of duty, conflict of interest and corruption.) - 2023.03.22 PM5
News(Top News : President Yoon Suk Yeol says it's time for Seoul-Tokyo relations to move forward amid strong domestic backlash to his diplomatic push.) - 2023.03.21 PM5
